feed.title: WeddingShare Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.6.8
entry.content:
Changes

  • Moved thumbnails from a single master directory into smaller gallery level directories.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.6.7...1.6.8

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.6.9
entry.content:
Added

  • Added EU GDPR cookie policy popup.
  • Added settings to enable/disable the popup notice as well as setting a custom notice.
  • Added audit logging to log the IP of users that accept the cookie notice.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.6.8.4...1.6.9

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.6.10
entry.content:
Changes

  • Started the migration away from gallery names as identifiers to gallery Ids.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.6.9.3...1.6.10

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.6.11
entry.content:
Changes

  • Added gallery identifiers to better track galleries as multiple users may want to have galleries with the same name.
  • Fixed a bug whereby the "all" gallery size wasn't being calculated correctly.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.6.10.8...1.6.11

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.7.0
entry.content:
Changes

  • Deprecated the LOGO and GALLERY_BANNER_IMAGE environment variables in favour of custom resources.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.6.11.1...1.7.0
